Text: Proposed GISB Between Bridgeline Gas Marketing LLC and ENA Upstreamregard to the special provisions that you submitted for our review we would like to delete paragraph which seems to be applicable to wellhead production committed under a contract I dont believe this is the case wi th the gas Bridgeline is purchasing from ENA Upstream Also we would like to add taping language similar to The Parties agree that each party may electronically record all telephone conversations between their respective employees without any special or further notice and each party hereby waives any claim against the validity of any telephonic Transaction under laws that may require a writing otherwise and agrees that such recordings are admissible as evidence in any court or other proceeding for any purpose relating to any proposed or concluded Transaction or other matter under thi s Contract Please give me a call if we need to discuss these two items in further deta il
